main event: An unidentified object was observed in Dayton, Ohio, on July 19, 1957, traveling in a horizontal direction for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was seen overhead and moved horizontally without additional details provided., This sighting was part of the Project Blue Book documentation process., There are references to multiple reports and cases from the same period indicating increased UFO sightings., Discussion of a possible connection between this report and other local sightings., Investigations based on insufficient data for evaluation by the USAF.
witness description: No confirmed witnesses described in the report.
